p: To check the antipromastigote activity of C. fistula, log-phase promastigotes were incubated at a density of 5 × 10 6 parasites in the presence and absence of leaf methanolic extract. To determine the IC 50 value, parasites were incubated at different concentrations of extract. The percentage inhibition was calculated as (mean parasite number of treated sample/mean parasite of control) × 100. The IC 50 value was determined by extrapolating the graph of % of viable parasites under treatment versus the concentration of extract.
